Text: E-ki bo̩ de̩, amo̩maye, me̩ ki chadua todu wa, todu kʼo̩la Ondu ki fule, kʼi fʼojima ne̩, alu kʼi ño̩ de̩ ugbo me̩ ge̩;
todu ku ma ki gba wa bʼame̩nebita kpʼame̩ne̩bibi o̩wo̩ te̩. Todu i chʼo̩chaka amone̩ nʼe̩do̩ ekono n.
Ondu muda chʼachubi one̩, owñ le̩ ahi ume̩ e̩re̩ nyane̩, i lañʼade me̩ bʼe̩ne̩bibi le̩ o̩wo̩ te̩.
E̩do̩-wa mugba ef Ondu ugbo e-me̩, ka kʼe̩wñ kʼa ñwa ñwu me̩ le̩, me̩ jʼo̩mo̩ ache, me̩ ñʼache alo waa ge̩.
Oñ Ondu ki naña e̩do̩-me̩ o̩na tef ufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ kpai tef e̩do̩ elichi e-Kraisti ogbolo.
A la añwa ñwu me̩-i ef odu Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti, amo̩maye, me̩ te̩ubi bʼo̩maye du kʼi tale alala te̩, kʼi ma likpa e̩wñ o̩gu ku me̩ gba ugbo wa le̩ n.
Todu ame̩ onugo chema alu ki dukpe̩ ku me̩ wʼuwa che; todabu kʼawa ma tʼachʼalala ef ume̩ le̩ n.
A la je̩ uje̩wñ ele ofo ugbo e̩ne̩ du n; chai akanya kpʼo̩pe̩cha ki wo̩ wa oñ a che odu kpʼo̩ro̩ka kʼa we echʼadu ki anʼe̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ oji.
I cheka kʼa nʼo̩da-wñ ni n, ama todu kʼawa ki kʼo̩la-wa chʼe̩wñ uwo̩li ñwu me̩ ku me̩ wʼuwa che.
Todu i chaka chʼe̩gba kʼa jʼugbo me̩ le̩, a fʼe-i ñwa ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ ki ma dʼone̩ e̩do̩ ki chuko̩lo̩ n, mak i ki we eje̩ e̩wñ.
Todu a gbʼinabali abo iche̩ka ef ume̩ ku ma tale alala, ma chuko̩lo̩ du n, chai amagwoji ma che.
Oñ a añwa ñw abo e̩gʼe-le̩, a lañʼadugbe̩do̩ ñwu ma ef Ondu Jisus Kraisti, todu kʼama ki gugu chii achuko̩lo̩ ku ma nʼuje̩wñ e-ma o̩toto̩la-ma ku ma je̩.
I muda chʼame̩, amo̩maye, e̩wñ o̩me̩me̩le̩ eche ki hia me̩ n.
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma gbʼo̩la-wa kʼi dʼef o̩takada-i gbo n, me̩ fʼeju kʼo̩ hi, todu ku me̩ ki we̩ edʼu cho̩la, todu kʼi fejutunyane̩.
I ki muda dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩nebi eju-me̩ n, me̩ ki muda kʼo̩ ibe dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩maye.
Oñ Ondu ure̩do̩ onugo ki dʼure̩do̩ ñwu me̩ e̩gba du lʼo̩na tʼo̩na du. Ondu ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka.
Ugwa e-mi Po̩l, kʼo̩wo̩-mi onugo ko̩ de̩. E-le̩ chʼujiwe-mi ef o̩takada du, abe̩le̩ nako̩.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ki dʼugbo me̩ chaka.
